languages.text:
"По старшинству уступаю я право
Первым удар нанести.
Только последний удар все равно
Будет сделан рукою Хальбрандта!"

"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"
languages.original_text:
"По старшинству уступаю я право
Первым удар нанести.
Только последний удар все равно
Будет сделан рукою Хальбрандта!"

traits.locale_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
“我让出了第一击的权利，
作为对前辈的敬意。
但最后一击属于我，
敌人必将死在，
哈尔布兰特的手上。”
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
“我让出了第一击的权利，
作为对前辈的敬意。
但最后一击属于我，
敌人必将死在，
哈尔布兰特的手上。”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
「年長者の礼に応じ、
先制攻撃の権利を与えよう、
しかし自ら与える祝意はここまで、
敵は死すべし
ハルブラントの手によって！」
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
「年長者の礼に応じ、
先制攻撃の権利を与えよう、
しかし自ら与える祝意はここまで、
敵は死すべし
ハルブラントの手によって！」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
«A mis superiores concedo
el derecho al primer golpe,
mas el último a mí pertenece.
¡El enemigo morirá
a manos de Halbrandt!».
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
«A mis superiores concedo
el derecho al primer golpe,
mas el último a mí pertenece.
¡El enemigo morirá
a manos de Halbrandt!».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
« Devant mon aîné je m'incline
et lui concède le premier coup,
mais pour moi le dernier je garde,
afin que de la main d'Halbrandt
notre ennemi périsse ! »
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
« Devant mon aîné je m'incline
et lui concède le premier coup,
mais pour moi le dernier je garde,
afin que de la main d'Halbrandt
notre ennemi périsse ! »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
"Dem Älteren geziemt
das Recht des ersten Schlags,
doch den letzten führe ich,
zu fällen den Feind
mit Halbrandts Hand!"
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
"Dem Älteren geziemt
das Recht des ersten Schlags,
doch den letzten führe ich,
zu fällen den Feind
mit Halbrandts Hand!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
"Büyüğümün önünde eğilirim,
Onun hakkıdır ilk vuruş.
Beklerim son vuruşu,
Düşmanındır zira ölüm.
Halbrandt gereğini yapacaktır!"
languages.original_text:
"To my elder bowing,
The right of first-blow yielding,
But last for myself keeping,
The foe shall die
by Halbrandt's hand!"

traits.locale_text:
"Büyüğümün eğilirim önünde,
ilk vuruş onun hakkıdır.
Fakat son vuruşu kendime saklarım.
Zira düşman ölmelidir
Halbrandt'in elinden!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine
